question.question: What is the correct syntax for an if/else statement in JavaScript?
choices: if(condition) { // code to execute } else { // code to execute }
if(condition) { // code to execute } else(condition) { // code to execute }
if(condition) { // code to execute }; else { // code to execute };
if(condition) { // code to execute }; else(condition) { // code to execute };
